price: (86) What remains [lawful] from Allāh is best for you, if you would be believers. But I am not a guardian over you."
arabic: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: baqiyyatu al-lahi khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minīna wamā anā ʿalaykum biḥafīẓin
